attributes.action: Call for the resignation of Jeremy Hunt for bringing the NHS to its knees.
attributes.background: Since Jeremy Hunt has been in charge of the NHS IT HAS BEEN CONSISTENTLY UNDERFUNDED. It has been mis managed and has led to enormous stress on the system and those working in it, and using it. We call for the resignation of Jeremy Hunt.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
